data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Gremio's half.
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro push forward at Independencia and Jefferson Savarino gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Gremio defence.
Gremio's Isaque attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
In Belo Horizonte Atletico Mineiro drive forward through Keno. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 11, Goal! Atletico Mineiro have got their heads in front thanks to a Keno strike.
Great play from Jefferson Savarino to set up the goal.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Keno.
In the minute 15, Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the home team a throw-in.
Keno for Atletico Mineiro is back on the field again.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Gremio a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
In the minute 20, Free kick for Gremio in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 22, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Goal kick for Gremio at Independencia.
Keno (Atletico Mineiro) strikes at Independencia but his header is cleared.
In the minute 23, Free kick in a good position for Atletico Mineiro!
Atletico Mineiro's Jefferson Savarino gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gremio defender.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 26, Atletico Mineiro have a dangerous throw-in.
Atletico Mineiro are pushing forward but Jair's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
Important block from the Gremio defence as Keno fires in a strike for Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
The match at Independencia has been interrupted briefly for a check on Paulo Victor, who is down injured.
Gremio's Paulo Victor looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 31, Atletico Mineiro's Guga breaks free at Independencia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Gremio at Independencia.
Gremio needs to be cautious. Atletico Mineiro have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 34, Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Gremio a goal kick.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In Belo Horizonte, Jefferson Savarino of Atletico Mineiro is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 39, In Belo Horizonte, Jair of Atletico Mineiro is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Atletico Mineiro's Eduardo Sasha is on target but unsuccessful.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Belo Horizonte to check on Pepe, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 42, Free kick Gremio.
Gremio's Pepe is back in action after a slight knock.
Robinho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gremio.
In the minute 43, Attention is being given to Atletico Mineiroâ€™s Everson and play has been suspended briefly.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Gremio close to the penalty box.
In the minute 44, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Gremio.
Everson is back on the pitch.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 45, Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
At Independencia the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the away team a throw-in.
Gremio's Diogo Barbosa gets in a shot on goal at Independencia. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Belo Horizonte.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Gremio.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Gremio at Independencia.
Goal! Atletico Mineiro extend their lead to 2-0 through Keno.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
In the minute 53, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 2-1 through a strike by Isaque. .
In the minute 56, Eduardo Sasha of Atletico Mineiro smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro's Jefferson Savarino gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 56, Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
Free kick for Gremio in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 57, The away team replace Darlan Mendes with Guilherme Azevedo.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a throw-in for Gremio, close to Atletico Mineiro's area.
In Belo Horizonte Gremio attack through Robinho. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 58, It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
Gremio push upfield and Isaque gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Atletico Mineiro defence.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 61, Jorge Sampaoli (Atletico Mineiro) is making a first substitution, with Allan replacing Nathan.
Atletico Mineiro are coming forward and Guilherme Arana gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Gremio have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the away team a throw-in.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 64, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Gremio.
In the minute 65, Jair (Atletico Mineiro) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! Atletico Mineiro extend their lead to 3-1 through Keno.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Gremio's half.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Gremio.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Gremio at Independencia.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Gremio's half.
Luiz Fernando is replacing Isaque for Gremio at Independencia.
Rildo Goncalves is on a sub for Robinho for Gremio.
Free kick Gremio.
In the minute 73, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 75, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Igor Rabello for Atletico Mineiro who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Igor Rabello is back on his feet again.
Gremio's Guilherme Azevedo misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Gremio.
Important block from the Gremio defence as Guilherme Arana fires in a strike for Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
At Independencia, Luiz Fernando has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 80, Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Gremio.
Throw-in high up the field for Gremio in Belo Horizonte.
In the minute 82, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Can Gremio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atletico Mineiro's half?
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 83, It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
In the minute 85, Ferreira is replacing Pepe for the away team.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 86, Atletico Mineiro make their second substitution with Marrony replacing Eduardo Sasha.
In the minute 87, Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
Hyoran is on a sub for Alan Franco for Atletico Mineiro.
The home team have replaced Guga with Bueno. This is the fourth substitution made today by Jorge Sampaoli.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Atletico Mineiro in Belo Horizonte.
In the minute 89, 5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Gremio.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Gremio.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
It's 3-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Jorge Sampaoli is making the team's fifth substitution at Independencia with Savio replacing Jefferson Savarino.
